body:
Drexel Hamilton analyst Brian White reiterated a Buy rating and $185 price target on Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) ahead of Q1 results Tomorrow evening (1/31). He said Apple remains one of the most underappreciated stocks in the world.

For an analyst ratings summary and ratings history on Apple click here. For more ratings news on Apple click here.
title: Drexel Hamilton Positive on Apple (AAPL) Into Q1 Print; 'Remains One of the Most Underappreciated Stocks in the World'
